titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make a technical correction in the definition of outpatient speech-language pathology services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Amends part D (Miscellaneous) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to define outpatient speech-language pathology services.
